title: The Herd-HOUR 1-Lakers, Mahomes, LeBron, Cowboys
itunes:title: The Herd-HOUR 1-Lakers, Mahomes, LeBron, Cowboys
description:
Colin discusses why he feels the Lakers will beat the Heat in 5 games

Patrick Mahomes is great but had an easier path than most

LeBron James always knew the right time to leave

The Cowboys don't know who they are



Guest: Nick Wright
